thread.title: ‘Soon’ Review: Why Tomorrow Can Be Forever

author: Laura Vanderkam
title: ‘Soon’ Review: Why Tomorrow Can Be Forever
text:
Let’s say that an editor has assigned you a book to review, with your copy due March 5. If you wait until March 5 to start writing, something might come up. Your laptop melts down. Your baby sitter calls in sick. You find yourself with nothing much to say. Result: You turn in something late, or something bad. Wouldn’t it be better to sit down and compose a draft a week before? Now you’ll be in a position to contend with unforeseen obstacles and have time for polishing with no danger of missing the deadline. You’re happy. Your editor is happy. Even a few readers may be happy.
